review: I love the interface, but I've had the Fire TV stick for a little over a month and I've had nothing but connection issues. It works great after a restart for about five minutes, then it's hit and miss buffering. Streaming works great on my other devices for Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon prime.I've...-Tried updating the firmware-Changed the position of my TV-Placed wireless router five feet away from TV-Changed wireless channels and bands-Dedicated a wireless router to the Fire stickThe wireless connectivity issue seems half-baked. Maybe it could be fixed with firmware in the future, but for now I'm switching to a Fire TV box or Roku.
